scripts.watch: npm run sync:version && NODE_ENV=development npm run build:css && npm run copy:assets && parcel watch src/{*.js,*.html}
scripts.build: npm run sync:version && NODE_ENV=production npm run build:css && parcel build src/{*.js,*.html} && npm run copy:assets
scripts.pack: NODE_ENV=production npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
